scene
Class Intersection

java.lang.Object
  scene.Intersection

public class Intersection
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents all the information for an intersection of a ray with an object.

Field Summary
private  double distance
           
private  ISceneObject intersectionObject
           
private  IPoint3D intersectionPoint
           
private  boolean intersects
           
private  IVector3D normal
           
private  IRay ray
           
 
Constructor Summary
Intersection()
          Constructs an intersection object.
 
Method Summary
 double getDistance()
          Returns the distance of the intersection point from the origination point.
 ISceneObject getIntersectionObject()
          Returns the object which intersected with the ray.
 IPoint3D getIntersectionPoint()
          Returns the intersection point.
 IVector3D getNormal()
          Returns the normal of the surface at the intersection point.
 IRay getRay()
          Returns the Ray for the intersection.
 boolean isIntersects()
          Returns 'true' if the ray intersected with an object in the scene, or 'false' otherwise.
 void setIntersectionHit(IPoint3D hitPoint, double distance, ISceneObject obj, IVector3D normal, IRay ray)
          Marks this intersection as a successful hit with an object in the scene.

isIntersects

public boolean isIntersects()
Returns 'true' if the ray intersected with an object in the scene, or 'false' otherwise.

public void setIntersectionHit(IPoint3D hitPoint,
                               double distance,
                               ISceneObject obj,
                               IVector3D normal,
                               IRay ray)
Marks this intersection as a successful hit with an object in the scene.

Parameters:
hitPoint - The intersection point with the object.
distance - The distance of the intersection point from the originating point.
obj - The object which intersected with the ray.
normal - The normal of the surface at the intersection point.
ray -
